description1.title: Easy Moderation
description1.description: Go into staff mode and use the staff tools to moderate the chat.

description2.title: Managing Punishments
description2.description: Manage all the punishments of any player

description3.title: Templates
description3.description: Create punish templates to fasten the process of banning and mutes.

description4.title: Player Info
description4.description: Get all the information of any player

features.title: Warnings & Mutes
features.description: Don't you want to ban them directly? Warn or Mute them instead.

features.title: History
features.description: Always keep track of all the previous punishments of any player.

features.title: Report System
features.description: Report any player to the staff team.
